column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I very much enjoy the cute environment in this cafe/bakery. I absolutely LOVE their croissants
column2: especially the pistachio one. Highly recommend that one as well as the almond one. I've also tried a few of the beautiful cakes/pastries
column3: which were divine. Iced coffee is pretty good
column4: too. Items here are a bit pricey
column5: but I will definitely be going back.
